sqlMap.select: SELECT SITE_URL, SITE_ID, SITE_NM, SITE_DC, SITE_THEMA_CL_CODE, B.CODE_NM SITE_THEMA_CL_NM, A.ACTVTY_AT, CASE A.ACTVTY_AT WHEN 'Y' THEN '활성' ELSE '비활성' END ACTVTY_AT_NM, A.USE_AT, CASE A.USE_AT WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '미사용' END USE_AT_NM, USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSITELIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID ='COM023' AND A.SITE_THEMA_CL_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON C.ESNTL_ID= A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId#
